title: File:Deception-Tourists.jpg
author: Lyubomir Ivanov (claimed), as Apcbg
description: Tourists, one of whom wears a Viking helmet, relax in a volcanic spring surrounded by black rock at Port Foster, Deception Island.  Behind, a ship with red hull and white superstructure floats in the water, and, in the distance, mountains are obscured by low-lying clouds.
